body:
This line was compatible with the interfaces before, but now requires a specific implementation:

https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/72a690216a7165be1402271db353199044218d7f/framework/validators/UniqueValidator.php#L163

cc @developeruz 

We should add an instanceof check there.

issue.title: Calling unknown method: yii\mongodb\ActiveQuery::createCommand()

labels.name: status:to be verified
labels.description: Needs to be reproduced and validated.

issue.body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?
On saving/update a model at unique validation
### What's expected?
validate uniqueness of a row before inserting
### What do you get instead?
Unknown Method â€“ yii\base\UnknownMethodException
Calling unknown method: yii\mongodb\ActiveQuery::createCommand()

### Additional info
validation rukes are as follow
`[['content'],'unique','targetAttribute'=>['content','created_by'],'message'=>'Seem you already a contact with this email address'],
          [['guid'],'unique','targetAttribute'=>['guid','created_by'],'message'=>'Seem you already a contact`

| Q                      | A
| ---------------------- | ---
| Yii version            |
| Yii MongoDB version    |
| MongoDB server version |
| PHP version            |
| Operating system       |

body: `ActiveQueryInterface::asArray()` should be used at that line instead of `createCommand()` usage.
`select()` is also not provided by some implementations such as redis.
@samdark `afterFind()` is not called on an array...
Still, either it should belong `QueryInterface` or removed from validator.
check for `$query instanceof \yii\db\ActiveQuery` can be done. I am working on a solution.

@developeruz nope https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2-mongodb/blob/master/ActiveQuery.php

That's active query but not DB active query.
@developeruz no, it can be an instance of mongodb, elasticsearch or redis query. the only thing they have in common is ActiveQueryInterface.
